About me

Nice to meet you, my name is Tyler Sprouse but I go by Houston. I'm beginner a web developer and designer from Charlotte NC. I've worked jobs from retail to full on research and design.

I'm passionate about weightlifting, anime, nature, and creating / finding cool and original websites.

I'm always ready to learn more about development and work with great people while doing so.
